content:
Hello,

I'm looking to add Medicare and Medicaid identifiers to the Patient resource. I was trying to search the HL7 OID registry so I could add the proper assigning authority OID to these. I didn't find what looked like an official OID for either Medicare or Medicaid. I found one for "cms" (2.16.840.1.113883.3.249) but this didn't allow me to differentiate between Medicare and Medicaid even though CMS is the one that assign these two numbers.

Anyone have any insight into this?

Thanks

Fred
